attributes.action: Polygraph Test to be taken by Kate McCann and Gerry McCann
attributes.additional_details:
"The Campaign For McCanns To Undergo a 'Lie Detector Test is filing this petition On 29th day of October in 2013.

We the general public ask for an enforcement of 'A Lie Detector Test', also known as a 'Polygraph Test' also known as a 'Psychophysiology Detection of Deception or Credibility Assessment', We would duly implore a full enquiry and full questioning of Kate McCann and Gerry McCann in the disappearance of Madeleine McCann .

The presumption of innocence, which is an integral part of the Basic Law's principle would suppress numerous suspicions of Kate McCann and Gerry McCann in further assumption that Kate McCann and Gerry McCann are or have been guilty of any criminal activity in the disappearance of Madeline McCann

               Truth and Honesty is sought
                 No man is above the Law-

                   'Nemo supra legem est' - ''

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter.
